text: Plessey was a British electronics company. It can also refer to: * Plessey Code, a British barcode system * Plessey System 250, a computer system that implements capability based addressing * Plessey railway station, a disused halt near Plessey village, in Northumberland * Plessey Woods Country Park, near Plessey village, in Northumberland ==See also== * Plessey v Ferguson * Pleshey * Plassey (disambiguation)
title: Plessey (disambiguation)
